0.text:
Sparking and smoking, your ship limps away from the clutches of the [aliens]. In the skirmish, your pilot was killed. As second-in-command, the responsibility of getting the citizens aboard this vessel* falls to you. As you run up to take control of the ship, the computer asks for confirmation of your codex.
Enter name (using the *input* command):
